items.title: Marcus Freeman is going to be a HOT name for a new job this coaching cycle
items.summary: College football is on fire right now. It’s more like a double fire though. The season itself has been outstanding with plenty of storylines all around and there are still over 30 schools that still have a fair chance at making the college football playoff. The HOTTEST thing about college football, however, isn’t the play […]

items.title: OPENING ODDS: Notre Dame is a MASSIVE road favorite over Boston College
items.summary: Notre Dame is coming off of a bye weekand is currently ranked #12 in the country with a 5-2 record. The Irish know that they need to be as dominant as they can be in their final five games of the season to help make a lasting impression with the college football playoff committee. Ever […]

items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 9 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with two victories which covered massive spreads in a 28-7 win […]

items.title: Notre Dame’s “rankings journey” hits a wall after the bye week
items.summary: The Notre Dame football team sat back this past Saturday and ate their cheeseburgers during their final bye week of the season. In a weekend of mostly “meh” matchups, the final results once the clock went sero were also mostly “meh” as well. Don’t get me wrong — I found Saturday to be highly entertaining, […]

items.title: GAME THREAD: Week 9 of the college football season
items.summary: I hope everyone is enjoying their cheeseburgers this week as the Notre Dame Fighting Irish take the week off from playing college football. FUN FACT about me… I’ve had at least one cheeseburger every day since Sunday and could likely do another week without complaint. Anyways… enjoy this no stress weekend. It’s a fairly light […]

items.title: Notre Dame is ready for the Jeremiyah Love Heisman run
items.summary: As we are all set and ready to enjoy a Notre Dame Football bye week (also known as the cheeseburger bye week) the noise surrounding things OTHER than the college football playoff is starting to get turned up a notch or two. One of those things is the Heisman Trophy, and a name that is […]

items.title: Cheeseburger Bye Week: Staff Picks for Week 9 in College Football
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are slowly, but surely, moving up the rankings as they work toward a college football playoff berth. The boys are off this week and are at home eating cheeseburgers, but there’s an entire college football world that plays this weekend. It’s playoff football every week for the Irish moving forward, […]
